author: potuz
content: Regardless what happens tomorrow my deep respect and congratulations to everyone involved in the design of ETH2.0. Up until a few weeks ago I hadn't read anything about Ethereum and found by chance the Casper paper in the arxiv. In just a few weeks I now understand why people find this design beautiful and challenging it's been addictive.  The more you read the more you forget about your own job

author: potuz
content: I should also add to design, my congratulations to those in charge of implementation. Although I believe we're rushing into this without having had a flawless public testnet launch, my interactions mostly with people from prysm but also from guys from Lighthouse, Tekku, Nimbus and Attestant has been an incredible experience.
